scripts.add: sh -c 'if [[ -n $(git status --porcelain) ]]; then git add . && echo ${0} ${*} | git commit -aF - && yarn version --minor && git push; fi'
scripts.preadd: bun run --silent repo && git checkout main
scripts.patch: sh -c 'if [[ -n $(git status --porcelain) ]]; then git add . && echo ${0} ${*} | git commit -aF - && yarn version --patch && git push; fi'
scripts.prepatch: bun run --silent repo && git checkout main
